--- In gladiator@y..., "Wesley Roberts" <WRA_@h...> wrote:
> I've alwats like the archer, nothing like exploding bolts to clean 
out a 
> corridor.

I am NOT asking about your favorite character(s).  I am asking about 
which character(s) you consider perfect.  What I plan on doing is 
having a discussion about ways to improve the imperfect characters 
once everybody has chimed in his/her opinion.  How I plan on tackling 
this is having discussion about 2-4 characters at a time.
